title: The Invertebrates
brief_description: Defines invertebrates and shows examples of protozoa, sponges, coelenterates, worms, echinoderms, molluscs and arthropods. Suggests key descriptive words to use in remembering characteristics of each group. Suitable for upper secondary level.
